scripts.build: npm run minify && npm run type-check
scripts.release:patch: npm run build && npm version patch -m "release: v%s" && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && npm version minor -m "release: v%s" && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm run build && npm version major -m "release: v%s" && git push && git push --tags
